work.des: As a Java Full Stack Developer, responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining web applications across both front-end and back-end. Skilled in Java, Spring Boot, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and databases like SQL. Building dynamic user interfaces, implementing RESTful services, and ensuring seamless integration between server and client-side components.

I am an Experienced Software Developer with a strong technical background and exceptional project management skills. Proven ability to effectively manage multiple projects simultaneously, resulting in significant efficiencies for previous employers.

internship.des: I had the opportunity to immerse myself in Java Full Stack Development, gaining valuable hands-on experience and enhancing my skills in both front-end and back-end technologies.
Analyzing raw data, Developing and maintaining datasets, Improving data quality and efficiency by using mathematics, Statistics, AI, ML/DL and Computer engineer in a Live Projects.
